features_Skills.points: Comprehensive Motivation Content: Provides a variety of motivational quotes, stories, and tips to inspire and encourage users.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed to be easy to navigate and visually appealing, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Speaker Functionality: Includes a speaker feature that allows users to listen to motivational content instead of reading it, enhancing accessibility and user convenience.
Responsive Design: Ensures the website is accessible and looks great on all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.
Tech stack : HTML5, Css3/Scss, Canvas, and JavaScript(ES6)
Delight in our visually appealing website offering effortless browsing of our diverse menu and easy reservation-making.
Embark on a culinary journey enhanced by technology, experiencing the fusion of flavours and web innovation
Tech stack : HTML5, Css3/Scss, Canvas, and JavaScript(ES6)
Crafted a dynamic multi-calculator website with arithmetic, BMI, sample interest, and CGPA calculators.
Ensured seamless user experience with intuitive interfaces and efficient calculations.
Delivered a versatile tool catering to diverse mathematical needs.
Tech stack:  HTML5, Css3/Scss, and JavaScript.
Planet Information: Retrieves and displays detailed information about all planets discovered till now.
RESTful API Integration: Uses a RESTful API to dynamically fetch and update planet details.
Comprehensive Data: Provides information about each planet, including various attributes and characteristics.
Responsive Design: Ensures the application is accessible and looks great on all devices.
